0520/A0/05/002/004.headline: In 2016  UNICEF Botswana supported: development of newborn care clinical guidelines  a successful switch from tOPV to bOPV vaccine in all 28 health districts  Measles-Rubella vaccination reaching 674 140 children aged 9 months to 14 years (95.4% coverage)  and data analysis to inform the national nutrition response to the El-nino drought.
